title: Minimalistic Tension
description: Minimalistic tension cues ideal for Crime, Drama, Trailers and Documentaries.

title: Rock Riffs
description: A collection of rock riffs perfect for sports and action scenes.

title: Good Vibes
description: A collection of upbeat, uplifting and motivational music perfect for Cooking, Sports, Daytime TV and DIY shows.

title: Dark Ambient Emotions
description: A colection of dark ambient tracks perfect for crime drama, horror movies and video games.

title: Funk Machine
description: A selection of fun funk tracks ranging from upbeat, energetic and lively to calm, chilled and sophisticated. Also containing elements of pop, rock, fusion and Jazz.
